about_the_game:
What really makes Moon War Meta unique is definitely its incredible visual style and attention to detail.

You will notice right from the start that the game brings you in a very creative, exciting and realistic sci-fi world where you get to explore new worlds, complete all kinds of objectives and also collect incredible items, rarities that you just can’t find anywhere else.

You can build your own city the way you like, and thanks to the Unity game design engine,​ Moon War Meta looks amazing and even photorealistic.
On top of that, the decentralized metaverse world and the fact you have governance is what really sets Moon War Meta apart.



Since Moon War Meta is an RPG at its core, you have multiple game modes to check out.
You have Player versus Player, Player versus World, Ranked gameplay, but also Team vs Team and Teams War.



Welcome to the Spacecraft Customization Center in Moon War Meta, part of our exclusive Kickstarter Founder's Pack!

Craft your own unique spacecraft from scratch or modify existing models to suit your playstyle and strategy. With a vast array of components, weapons, and enhancements at your disposal, the possibilities are limitless. Whether you prefer agile interceptors, heavily armored cruisers, or versatile jack-of-all-trades vessels, the choice is yours. Take command, unleash your creativity, and dominate the skies like never before in Moon War Meta!

What really makes Moon War Meta unique is definitely its incredible visual style and attention to detail.

You will notice right from the start that the game brings you in a very creative, exciting and realistic sci-fi world where you get to explore new worlds, complete all kinds of objectives and also collect incredible items, rarities that you just can’t find anywhere else.

On top of that, the decentralized metaverse world and the fact you have governance is what really sets Moon War Meta apart.



Since Moon War Meta is an RPG at its core, you have multiple game modes to check out.
You have Player versus Player, Player versus World, Ranked gameplay, but also Team vs Team and Teams War.

name: Moon War Meta

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10+ (64 bit)
  • Processor: 6 Cores, 2.3 GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11

short_description: An open world space action RPG adventure that can be played both alone and together.
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain
*languages with full audio support
